name: SKSlideViewController
summary: An easy to use slide to navigate view controller for ios 6.0 +
description: SKSlideViewController is an easy to use, slide-to-navigate view controller for ios 6.0 +. It enables you to present a main view controller and an optional, direction-sensitive accessory view controller. It is easy to setup and modify.
